label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"鸡食盐中毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"饮水增加","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":43,"text":"粪便稀薄或者混有稀水","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 鸡食盐中毒的情况有轻有重，所以症状也不相同。症状轻微的，饮水增加，粪便稀薄或者混有稀水。

label: [{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":8,"end":14,"text":"羽毛松乱无光","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"松乱无光","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":15,"end":21,"text":"高度兴奋不安","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"鸣叫","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"争相饮水","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":30,"end":37,"text":"食欲不振或废绝","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":38,"end":42,"text":"嗉囊软胀","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"软胀","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":43,"end":53,"text":"口角有黏性分泌物流出","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":54,"end":65,"text":"两腿软弱无力或前后平伸","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":61,"end":65,"text":"前后平伸","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":56,"end":60,"text":"软弱无力","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":66,"end":70,"text":"倒退运动","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":76,"end":80,"text":"瘫于地上","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":81,"end":86,"text":"向一侧运动","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":87,"end":91,"text":"呆立一旁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":71,"end":91,"text":"后退几步即瘫于地上或向一侧运动或呆立一旁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"嗉囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"口角","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"两腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":46,"end":51,"text":"黏性分泌物","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 症状严重的，病鸡羽毛松乱无光、高度兴奋不安、鸣叫、争相饮水，食欲不振或废绝，嗉囊软胀、口角有黏性分泌物流出，两腿软弱无力或前后平伸、倒退运动，后退几步即瘫于地上或向一侧运动或呆立一旁。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"病雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"弓背缩颈","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"垂头闭眼","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"水样腹泻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":35,"text":"死前阵发性痉挛","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"抽搐","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":39,"end":43,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":44,"end":48,"text":"两翅伸展","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":49,"end":52,"text":"喙着地","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":55,"end":59,"text":"虚脱而死","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":12,"end":13,"text":"背","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":15,"text":"颈","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":17,"end":18,"text":"头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":20,"text":"眼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":26,"text":"腹","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"两翅","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":49,"end":50,"text":"喙","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"伸展","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 有的病雏表现精神沉郁、弓背缩颈、垂头闭眼，后期水样腹泻。死前阵发性痉挛、抽搐、呼吸困难、两翅伸展、喙着地，最后虚脱而死。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"死鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"皮下水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":22,"text":"有淡黄色胶样物浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"淡黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":34,"text":"腿部肌肉弥漫性出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":34,"text":"弥漫性出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":42,"text":"腹腔内大量积水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":47,"text":"淡黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":61,"text":"混有灰白色纤维蛋白渗出物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":54,"text":"灰白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"皮下","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":24,"text":"胸","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"腿部肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 死鸡被解剖之后，皮下水肿或有淡黄色胶样物浸润；胸、腿部肌肉弥漫性出血；腹腔内大量积水，呈淡黄色，并混有灰白色纤维蛋白渗出物；

label: [{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"嗉囊积有大量黏液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"黏液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":15,"text":"腺胃黏膜充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"形成假膜","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":40,"text":"小肠发生急性卡他性肠炎或出血性肠炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":40,"text":"出血性肠炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":34,"text":"急性卡他性肠炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":46,"text":"肝色淡肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":47,"end":53,"text":"边缘钝圆质脆","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":54,"end":62,"text":"肝被膜附有凝血块","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":59,"end":62,"text":"凝血块","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":69,"end":74,"text":"肝实质萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":72,"end":74,"text":"萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":75,"end":81,"text":"表面不平变硬","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":84,"end":90,"text":"肝面呈裂纹状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":91,"end":95,"text":"胆囊皱缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":93,"end":95,"text":"皱缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":87,"end":90,"text":"裂纹状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"嗉囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"腺胃黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"小肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":41,"end":42,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":54,"end":57,"text":"肝被膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":69,"end":70,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":84,"end":85,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":91,"end":93,"text":"胆囊","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 嗉囊积有大量黏液，腺胃黏膜充血，有的形成假膜；小肠发生急性卡他性肠炎或出血性肠炎；肝色淡肿大，边缘钝圆质脆，肝被膜附有凝血块，多数病例呈现肝实质萎缩，表面不平变硬，偶见肝面呈裂纹状，胆囊皱缩；

label: [{"start":0,"end":12,"text":"心外膜毛细血管扩张或出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"扩张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":18,"text":"心包有积液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"积液","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"肺水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"色淡灰红","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":40,"text":"脑膜及大脑皮层充血或水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"心外膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"毛细血管","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"心包","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":20,"text":"肺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"脑膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"大脑皮层","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 心外膜毛细血管扩张或出血，心包有积液；肺水肿，色淡灰红；脑膜及大脑皮层充血或水肿。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":24,"end":32,"text":"提供充足的新鲜水","labels":["control"]},{"start":33,"end":42,"text":"水中可以加入小牧侠","labels":["control"]},{"start":39,"end":42,"text":"小牧侠","labels":["drug"]},{"start":43,"end":47,"text":"维矿剑客","labels":["drug"]},{"start":48,"end":52,"text":"肝肾剑客","labels":["drug"]},{"start":3,"end":15,"text":"立即停止喂含盐过多的饲料","labels":["control"]}]
text: 病鸡要立即停止喂含盐过多的饲料，病鸡轻度或中度，提供充足的新鲜水，水中可以加入小牧侠：维矿剑客+肝肾剑客，促进新陈代谢，促进体内毒素排出；

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":8,"end":13,"text":"减少饮水量","labels":["control"]}]
text: 病鸡中毒严重，要减少饮水量，要不然会导致食盐被吸收扩散，使中毒症状加剧；

label: [{"start":1,"end":3,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":6,"end":9,"text":"葡萄糖","labels":["drug"]},{"start":36,"end":41,"text":"醋酸钾溶液","labels":["drug"]},{"start":50,"end":53,"text":"植物油","labels":["drug"]},{"start":24,"end":25,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":6,"end":18,"text":"葡萄糖或红糖水以利尿解毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":36,"end":43,"text":"醋酸钾溶液灌服","labels":["control"]},{"start":48,"end":55,"text":"服用植物油缓泻","labels":["control"]}]
text: 给病鸡5%的葡萄糖或红糖水以利尿解毒，病情严重的鸡再加0.3%～0.5%醋酸钾溶液灌服，中毒早期服用植物油缓泻可减轻症状。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"鸡食盐中毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":16,"text":"食欲不振或废绝","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":17,"end":23,"text":"嗉囊扩张膨大","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"扩张膨大","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":24,"end":34,"text":"口鼻中流出粘性分泌物","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":29,"end":34,"text":"粘性分泌物","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"患鸡口渴","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":40,"end":44,"text":"大量饮水","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":45,"end":48,"text":"常下痢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":49,"end":53,"text":"运动失调","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":54,"end":58,"text":"两脚乏力","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":56,"end":58,"text":"乏力","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":59,"end":63,"text":"行走困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":64,"end":68,"text":"神经症状","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"嗉囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"口鼻","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":37,"end":38,"text":"口","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"两脚","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"患鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡食盐中毒后表现为食欲不振或废绝，嗉囊扩张膨大，口鼻中流出粘性分泌物，患鸡口渴，大量饮水，常下痢，运动失调，两脚乏力，行走困难等神经症状。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"患鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"衰弱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"抽搐","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"虚脱而死","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 后期患鸡衰弱，呼吸困难、抽搐，最后虚脱而死。

label: [{"start":4,"end":13,"text":"嗉囊中充满粘性液体","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"粘性液体","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"粘膜脱落","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"脱落","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":25,"text":"腺胃粘膜充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":34,"text":"表面有时形成假膜","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":45,"text":"小肠有急性卡他性肠炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":45,"text":"急性卡他性肠炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":54,"text":"粘膜充血有出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":54,"text":"出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":59,"end":65,"text":"皮下组织水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":63,"end":65,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":66,"end":74,"text":"腹腔和心包有积水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":72,"end":74,"text":"积水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":75,"end":78,"text":"肺水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":76,"end":78,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":79,"end":85,"text":"心脏有出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":82,"end":85,"text":"出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":86,"end":90,"text":"血液浓稠","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":91,"end":99,"text":"脑膜血管扩张充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":95,"end":99,"text":"扩张充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":100,"end":110,"text":"常见针尖大小的出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"嗉囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"腺胃粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"小肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":59,"end":63,"text":"皮下组织","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":66,"end":68,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":69,"end":71,"text":"心包","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":75,"end":76,"text":"肺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":79,"end":81,"text":"心脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":86,"end":88,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":91,"end":95,"text":"脑膜血管","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 剖检可见嗉囊中充满粘性液体，粘膜脱落，腺胃粘膜充血，表面有时形成假膜，小肠有急性卡他性肠炎，粘膜充血有出血点，有时可见皮下组织水肿，腹腔和心包有积水，肺水肿，心脏有出血点，血液浓稠，脑膜血管扩张充血，常见针尖大小的出血点。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"鸡食盐中毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":11,"end":25,"text":"饲料中食盐添加量不超过0.5","labels":["control"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"拌和均匀","labels":["control"]},{"start":34,"end":39,"text":"鸡食盐中毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":41,"end":54,"text":"立即停喂食盐和食盐高的饲料","labels":["control"]},{"start":57,"end":59,"text":"患鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":59,"end":65,"text":"大量清洁饮水","labels":["control"]},{"start":66,"end":69,"text":"喂牛乳","labels":["control"]},{"start":73,"end":75,"text":"胃肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":94,"end":98,"text":"葡萄糖水","labels":["drug"]},{"start":89,"end":91,"text":"静注","labels":["control"]}]
text: 鸡食盐中毒的防治措施：饲料中食盐添加量不超过0.5%且拌和均匀。发现鸡食盐中毒后要立即停喂食盐和食盐高的饲料，供给患鸡大量清洁饮水或喂牛乳，以稀释胃肠中盐分的浓度，利于排泄，也可静注25%葡萄糖水1~3毫升以维持心脏功能。

label: [{"start":0,"end":1,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"食盐中毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":28,"end":29,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":82,"end":84,"text":"幼鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡的日粮中添加过多的食盐，则会引起食盐中毒。据资料报道，鸡的食盐最小致死量为每公斤体重4克或饲料中食盐在每公斤3克以上，饮水中食盐量达到0.5%以上即可引起中毒。在幼鸡的饮水中食盐含量达0.9%时可引起100%的死亡率。

label: [{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"体液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"软组织","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"胃液","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 食盐又称氯化钠，它变遍存在于鸡体所有的体液、软组织和鸡蛋。食盐有使鸡体组织保存一定分量水分的作用，它还是形成胃液的原料，对脂肪和蛋白质的消化吸收有重要作用。它又能改善日粮的适口性，促进食欲，提高饲料利用率，是一种必要的营养物质。

label: [{"start":26,"end":27,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":42,"end":43,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"鸡体","labels":["type"]},{"start":64,"end":65,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 植物性饲料中食盐含量很少，动物性饲料中含量软多，但在鸡的一般日粮中的食盐量是不能满足鸡的需要的，而鸡体中食盐的贮存也很有限。因此鸡的日粮中必须配合一定量的食盐，不然就会引起氯化钠的缺乏。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"食欲不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"消化障碍","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":21,"text":"脂肪及蛋白质的合成降低","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":24,"end":33,"text":"生长发育迟缓或停滞","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":34,"end":41,"text":"饲料利用率降低","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"啄癖","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 食欲不振，消化障碍，脂肪及蛋白质的合成降低。雏鸡生长发育迟缓或停滞，饲料利用率降低，出现啄癖。

label: [{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"骨质变软","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":19,"text":"眼角膜发生角质化","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":19,"text":"角质化","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":25,"text":"肾上腺肥大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"肥大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":32,"text":"血浆容量减少","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":48,"text":"生长极度不良","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":53,"text":"血液浓缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":54,"end":58,"text":"身体脱水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":53,"text":"浓缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":14,"text":"眼角膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":23,"text":"肾上腺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"血浆","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"幼鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 日粮中缺钠的骨质变软，眼角膜发生角质化，肾上腺肥大，血浆容量减少。幼鸡日粮中缺氧时，生长极度不良，血液浓缩，身体脱水。

label: [{"start":9,"end":10,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"生长障碍","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":25,"end":31,"text":"生殖机能降低","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":32,"end":40,"text":"饲料利用能力障碍","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":41,"end":46,"text":"死亡率增高","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"啄癖","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 如食盐的供应达不到鸡的正常需要量，同时又生长障碍、生殖机能降低，饲料利用能力障碍，死亡率增高，发现啄癖等临床关头，可初步作出诊断。

label: [{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 治疗：1、成年鸡一般每天只用食盐0.5―1.0克。2、雏鸡食盐的用量占粉料的0.5―1%。

label: [{"start":41,"end":42,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":58,"end":60,"text":"鸡只","labels":["type"]}]
text: 预防：1、各种日龄和不同用途的对食盐的正常需要量为日粮的0.37―0.5%，大群养鸡在日粮中按此量加入食盐，即可满足鸡只正常生长发育的需要。2、加喂青绿饲料过多时，应适当增喂食盐。
